code: export var validateEmail=function validateEmail(email){var regex=/^(([^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@\\"]+(\.[^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@\\"]+)*)|(\\".+\\"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/;return regex.test(email);};export var validateName=function validateName(name){var regex=/^[A-Za-záàâãéèêíïóôõöúçñÁÀÂÃÉÈÍÏÓÔÕÖÚÇÑ ]{2,}$/;return regex.test(name);};export var validateSignUp=function validateSignUp(email,name){if(validateEmail(email)){return true;}return false;};
